name: Goddess detective 2
description:
A newly married couple suddenly lost their engagement ring, according to the hostess. That day she went out to buy food, only out for ten minutes. When I came back, the ring was gone, but of course it was later discovered. But she hasn't been out since. Because we need to take wedding photos, I just remembered this ring. The couple was very anxious, so they found me. According to my professional analysis, this thief is a novice, not a repeat offender. It's time to shine a light on reality with my profession.

Role setting:
⚪ Shape setting: European and American style, pure and lovely, convex back.
⚪ Career setting: Goddess detective, bold and careful, the pursuit of truth.
⚪ Character setting: warm and cheerful, straight forward, rough and subtle.

Plot setting:
⚪ Rich content: a main line, interlocking, the truth.
⚪ Complete evidence: tailor-made, tightly interlocked, all the characters.
⚪ The end of the story: It dawned on me, and it dawned on me.
